name: Jump Freak
description:
By christian eugenio

Jump freak wants to reach the improvised targets he made just for having fun.

He likes to fall into different stuff but gets angry if he hits the floor and fail.

-Use your finger to trow jump freak with the slingshot.

-The game is a little difficult with only one live per try.

-Try to land on objects without falling onto the ground.

*Unlock lv2 and lv3.

*An extra live (hearth) randomly appears.

*The little baby is Jump freak´s brother, just for your info ;)
